name: Aldo Gordini
introduction: Aldo Gordini (born 20 May 1921 and died 28 January 1995) was an Italian-born French racing driver. He was the son of Amde Gordini, the owner of the French sports car manufacturer Gordini. He participated in the 1951 French Grand Prix driving a Simca-Gordini, although his car's engine did not manage to complete the race distance.
